ref: 14005a †halabhr̥ti -- f. ʻ ploughing, agriculture ʼ lex. (halahati -- f. id. W. ← MIA.). [halabhr̥t -- ʻ plough -- bearer (name of Balarāma) ʼ MBh. -- or poss. halá -- 1 + bhr̥tí<-> ʻ subsistence ʼ]
WPah.kṭg. ḷái f. ʻ drainage furrow ʼ (Him.I 190 < halahati -- ),
Bi. harāi ʻ landlord's right to use tenant's plough ʼ (rather than < *haladāti -- );
WPah.kṭg. ḷói m. ʻ ploughman ʼ (r̥ > u s.v. bhr̥ta -- , bhr̥tí -- ); with ext. -- ṭa -- :
L. halohiṛ f. ʻ ploughed land ʼ (rather than < *halōḍhi -- ); all scarcely < †halavāhā -- . J.C.W.
